GPLv2 tragtor multimedia.converter app:gui tragtor - a GUI for FFmpeg for audio and video-conversion With tragtor You can easily controll ffmpeg to convert media content in different formats using various container and codecs. http://repository.mein-neues-blog.de:9000/latest/tragtor.tar.gz
